title: Come see the dolphins
creator_credit: Tom Ascher and Coronet Instructional Media
brief_description: Presents the story of a young boy who accompanies his father, a dolphin keeper, to the zoo to see the dolphins. The boy learns of the appearance of dolphins, what they eat and how they communicate and navigate. Skillful photography includes observations underwater and behind the scenes views of equipment and workers needed to maintain the dolphin pool.
